Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these planning to use them on my verizon accountI already had..Verizon refused to turn them on saying they had tobe used on a prepaid account for 6 month FIRST...I am cancelling my account when the contract with verizon is up in February but BEWAREof this fact.I know the ad called it a Verizon Prepaid phone BUTit needs to spell out verizons stupid rule.I just threw the phonesaway.

ProductInfo.Features:
PREPAID VERIZON Wireless CELL PHONE
Slim and Compact Design
1.3 megapixel Camera
SMS and MMS capable
Bluetooth Connectivity
ProductInfo.Name: LG VX5600 Accolade Verizon Wireless Prepaid Cell Phone w/ car Charger and Headset
